articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Autographs to Officials, Workers and Children
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Autographs to Officials, Workers and Children
Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un sent autographs to officials and other workers in various units and children after reading letters and a paper from them. 
					Among them were Hwang Sun Hui, curator of the Korean Revolution Museum, officials of the Ministry of Land and Marine Transport, shock brigade members of the construction site of the Tanchon Port, farmers of the Wonhwa Co-op Farm in Phyongwon County of South Phyongan Province, members of party cells of a candy workteam of the Musan Foodstuff Factory in North Hamgyong Province, the first creative group of the Korean April 26 Children's Film Studio, the cement factory in Hwaphyong County of Jagang Province, members of the women's union of the Sunchon Area Youth Coal Complex of the South Phyongan Province, wives of officials of the Sangwon County Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea who formed a group to take care of an expressway, officials and employees of the Transmission Line Laying Station, the Rangnang Ponghwa Garment Factory, the Pyongyang Daily Necessities Factory, institutions of the Ministry of Physical Culture and Sports, industrial establishments, Kim Jong Suk Nu
					
					rsery, the Academy of Koryo Medicine, scientists, technicians and teachers and children of Kyongsang Kindergarten.
					
					They said in their letters that the peerlessly great men who embraced all the revolutionary soldiers reposed trust and instilled strength into them, adding their loving care served as an engine that encouraged them to work fresh miracles and perform feats in the general advance for building a thriving nation.
					
					Every sentence of their letters reflects the will of all the service persons and other people to hold leader Kim Jong Il as the eternal leader of the WPK and win new victory in the revolution of Juche under the leadership of Kim Jong Un. 
					
					Kim Jong Un received a paper on Han Hyon Gyong, a fourth year girl student of Inphung Secondary School in Sinhung County, South Hamgyong Province, who protected portraits of the three commanders of Mt. Paektu at the cost of her life at a critical moment when her house was on the verge of collapse due to a landslide caused by a heavy rain.
					
					Kim Jong Un said in his autograph that the noble spirit displayed by Han Hyon Gyong would always live on and help the country produce more excellent young people.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Sudanese President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Sudanese President
Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greeting to Omar Hassan Ahmed AlÔºçBashir, president of Sudan, on Friday on the occasion of the 23rd anniversary of its revolution.
					In the belief that the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger, Kim in the message sincerely wished the president and people of Sudan great successes in their work to defend the sovereignty of the country and achieve the socio-economic development and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Yang Hyong Sop Meets Swiss Party Delegation
articles.content:
Yang Hyong Sop Meets Swiss Party Delegation
Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, had a friendly talk with the delegation of the Christian Democratic People's Party of Switzerland headed by Rene Imoberdorf, member of the Council of State from the party. The delegation paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Friday.

articles.title: Congratulations to PM of Greece
articles.content:
Congratulations to PM of Greece
Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- Choe Yong Rim, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, Thursday sent a congratulatory message to Antonis Samaras on his assumption as prime minister of Greece.
					The message wished him success in his work for the country's stability and development.

articles.title: Greetings to Oman FM
articles.content:
Greetings to Oman FM
Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun on May 25 sent a message of greeting to Yousef Bin Alawi Bin Abdullah, minister in charge of foreign affairs of Oman, on the 20th anniversary of diplomatic ties between the DPRK and Oman.
					The message lauded the two countries' efforts for developing the friendly ties while supporting and cooperating with each other in various fields after the establishment of diplomatic relations.
					
					Reassuring him of the DPRK's stand to further develop the friendly and cooperative ties, Pak wished the minister good health and happiness as well as greater success in his responsible work.

articles.title: Chinese Delegation Goes Back
articles.content:
Chinese Delegation Goes Back
Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Agricultural and Forestry Workers Union of China led by Wang Junwei, vice-president of its National Committee, went back home on Friday.

articles.title: Primary School, Kindergarten, Nursery Opened in Changjon Street
articles.content:
Primary School, Kindergarten, Nursery Opened in Changjon Street
Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- Pyongyang Changjon Primary School, Kyongsang Kindergarten and Kyongsang Nursery, built modernly in Changjon Street in Pyongyang, were opened along with removal to new houses in the street.
					Standing on the campus of the U-shaped primary school is a statue of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					Seen in the facade of its main building is the slogan "Let's learn for Korea".
					
					Each classroom has a schoolbag boxes in the rear.
					
					Ri Hyo Song, a teacher of the school, told KCNA that pupils can keep their bags in the boxes, not behind their chairs or under the desks. In corridors, there are benches with hooks, arranged for pupils to hang their padded clothes or raincoats in winter or rainy days. They were provided as suggested by the dear respected Kim Jong Un during his tour of the school in May this year, she added.
					
					Kyongsang Kindergarten and Kyongsang Nursery were put on the basis of formative art of architecture.
					
					In the kindergarten's playground, there are amusement facilities, including rotary spacecraft and elephant-shaped slide, which were sent by Kim Jong Un after his visit to it.
					
					A wading pool and amusement rooms were all built to suit preschoolers' interest.
					
					Artificial turf was laid under the amusement facilities of the nursery.

articles.title: Song "Forward to Final Victory" Inspires Korean People
articles.content:
Song "Forward to Final Victory" Inspires Korean People
Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- Recently, song "Forward to Final Victory" was created in the people in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					The song reflects the spirit of the times and the stamina of the DPRK that is speeding up the building of a thriving socialist nation under the guidance of the dear respected Kim Jong Un. The thriving socialist nation means single-minded unity and invincible military strength plus the industrial revolution in the new century.
					
					It reminds one of the military parade that took place in celebration of the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					It also tells how the DPRK advanced under the guidance of the great Generalissimos and what is the goal for final victory to be attained by its people in response to the call of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					The song hardens the will of the Korean army and people to devote their all to the prosperity of the country with high national pride.
					
					Hong Kwang Sun, vice-minister of Culture, told KCNA:
					
					"The song is just a powerful trumpet call of the revolution encouraging the army and people in the drive to build a thriving nation as well as a stirring drumbeat of victory.
					
					It is a picture of the DPRK that all the people are advancing toward prosperity under the guidance of the WPK and the blessing of the peerlessly great men."
					
					Jon Chang Bok, a general officer of the Korean People's Army, said:
					
					"The song is like an appeal for the building of a thriving country.
					
					We, servicepersons, will fully discharge our duty in defending and carrying on the revolution, while reliably guaranteeing the cause of the WPK by dint of the invincible military strength."
					
					Jo Kyong Jun, head of the State Merited Chorus, said that singing this song, the Korean people would surely build a thriving socialist nation in which they will enjoy all the benefits.
					
					Kim Haeng Son, a department director at Kim Chaek University of Technology, said:
					
					"I will devote all my wisdom and efforts to laying scientific and technological foundations for the building of a thriving nation."

articles.title: Anti-U.S. Sentiments Run Higher among DPRK People
articles.content:
Anti-U.S. Sentiments Run Higher among DPRK People
Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- Many people have visited the National House of Class Education in Pyongyang during the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					On display at the house are materials and data laying bare the brutalities the U.S. imperialists have committed against the Korean people from a hundred and tens of years ago. 
					
					In particular, their atrocities committed during the Korean War (1950-1953) arouse great indignation.
					
					With torrential air raids and shelling, they destroyed to ashes cities, rural communities, industrial and cultural facilities, historical relics and remains and people's properties.
					
					In the three-year war, they dumped more than 428 000 bombs with 1 400 sorties on the city of Pyongyang alone.
					
					Kim Yu Chol, an employee at the Phyongchon District Horticultural Station in Pyongyang, told KCNA:
					
					"I have visited here several times. The visits would heighten my class consciousness and sense of vengeance.
					
					It's my fixed resolve to punish the U.S. imperialists still hell-bent on the moves for aggression on the DPRK and make them pay dear price for what they had done against the Korean people."
					
					Min Kum Song, a student at Kim Chaek University of Technology, said:
					
					"The United States should be mindful of the lesson it drew in the Korean War.
					
					If the U.S. and south Korea's Lee Myung Bak group of traitors finally unleash another war, the DPRK servicepersons and civilians will mercilessly annihilate the aggressors with the pent-up resentment and anger towards them."

articles.title: Sports Contest for Jongilbong Prize Closes
articles.content:
Sports Contest for Jongilbong Prize Closes
Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- The 38th National Sports Contest of School Youth and Children for Jongilbong Prize was closed with due ceremony in Jongju City, North Phyongan Province on Friday.
					The contest was held, divided into groups of secondary and primary schools. School youth and children gained good successes by displaying high technique they have trained through extracurricular sports activities.
					
					Boys of Pyongyang Ryongwang Secondary School and girls of Yongung Sinchang Secondary School in Pukchong County of South Hamgyong Province placed first in the national defence sports games while boys of Pyongyang Changjon Secondary School and girls of Pyongyang Phyongchon Secondary School in the volleyball matches. Boys of Pyongyang June 9 Ryongbuk Secondary School and girls of Pyongyang Kwangbok Secondary School came first in table tennis matches while Yongung Sinam Secondary School in Ryongchon County of North Phyongan Province proved successful in Korean wrestling games.
					
					Boys of Pyongyang Chungsong Primary School and girls of Kyongam Primary School of Sariwon City of North Hwanghae Province came first in the table tennis matches.

articles.title: U.S. Can Never Cover up Its True Colors as Provocateur of Korean War (3)
articles.content:
U.S. Can Never Cover up Its True Colors as Provocateur of Korean War (3)
Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- The United States fixed June 25 as the date for starting the Korean War. Lurking behind this was a crafty plot to cover up its true colors as a war provocateur.
					Historically, the "tactics of making a surprise attack at dawn of Sunday" was a trite method employed by the imperialists.
					
					The Russo-Japanese War, the Sino-Japanese War and the Pacific War were all kicked off with surprise attacks early Sunday mornings.
					
					The U.S. added a new meaning to this method. 
					
					It was proved by what Robert, head of the U.S. military advisory group, told Syngman Rhee.
					
					Explaining the reason why the U.S. chose June 25 for the start of the war, Robert said June 25 was Sunday and no one would believe that the Christian states, the U.S. and south Korea, would ignite a war on Sunday as they observe the Sabbath. 
					
					In other words, the decision was intended to make people believe that neither the U.S. nor south Korea provoked the war first, Robert said.
					
					The U.S. set in motion its paid media to release the following false report in a bid to cover up its true colors as a war provocateur: Two third of the south Korean puppet troops had an off-day on June 24 when the "preparatory martial law" that had been proclaimed on June 13 was lifted.   All brass hats of the units deployed in the areas along the 38th Parallel above divisional commanders took part in a "ball" held at a club of the puppet ground force in Seoul on that evening.
					
					But Ri Song Ga, commander of the 8th Division of the south Korean army deployed in the eastern sector of the front at that time, testified to the fact that all the puppet forces in the area along the 38th Parallel were on combat alert after being ordered not to leave their barracks on the eve of June 25 and launched an attack at dawn.
					
					With nothing can the U.S. cover its true colors as a war provocateur. It can never escape a severe punishment by history.
					
					The U.S. is instigating the south Korean puppet forces and the Japanese reactionaries to ignite the second Korean war, a nuclear war, instead of drawing a due lesson from its bitter defeat in the last Korean war,
					
					If the belligerent forces of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces dare provoke another war, oblivious of the lesson taught by history, they will face a strong counter-action of the army and people of the DPRK and meet a miserable end. Those who do not want peace but seek a war should bear this in mind.

articles.title: U.S. Brasshats Admit Defeat in Korean War
articles.content:
U.S. Brasshats Admit Defeat in Korean War
Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- Bradley, who was chairman of the U.S. Joint Chiefs of Staff during the Korean War (1950-1953), said that the Korean War was a wrong war the U.S. fought at the wrong time, in the wrong place and with the wrong enemy.
					When the U.S. imperialists were starting the Korean War, they judged that they could easily conquer the young Democratic People's Republic of Korea, drawing on their numerical and technical superiority.
					
					MacArthur, Ridgway, Clark, Van Fleet and other military "celebrities" of the U.S. came to the Korean War one after another.
					
					They tried to honor themselves by launching many new large-scale military operations, such as "General Christmas Offensive", "Thanksgiving Day Offensive", "Summer and Autumn Offensives" and "Kimhwa Offensive".
					
					However, in the three-year war those "reputed generals" could not but get disgrace as defeated generals.
					
					All of their operational plans resulted in failure.
					
					Gomes, ex-president of Portugal, who was the chief of staff of the Portuguese army in Macao in the period of the Korean War, said:
					
					"At that time all the operational plans on the U.S. side turned effective after rounds of deliberations by heads of state and chiefs of staff and a number of generals of the U.S. and Western nations, its allies.
					
					But, General Kim Il Sung crushed them all alone. Witnessing this fact, I came to realize that he is the only prominent strategist and illustrious commander in the world."

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Brands U.S. and S. Korea as Arch Criminal Escalating Tension on Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Brands U.S. and S. Korea as Arch Criminal Escalating Tension on Korean Peninsula
 Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Friday runs an article "Who is the provoker escalating the tension on the Korean Peninsula" by its commentator. The following is its full text: 
					 The situation of the Korean Peninsula is arousing great concern at home and abroad these days. 
					
					 The reckless moves of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet group are driving the inter-Korean relations into a more serious catastrophe and escalating the military tension as the days go by. 
					
					 Large and dangerous war maneuvers targeted against the DPRK are being staged in the West Sea of Korea and the waters off Jeju Island with the U.S. nuclear-powered carrier George Washington involved. The nexus for aggression is being tightened among the U.S., Japan and south Korea. 
					
					 Undisguised international confabs take place to insult and violate the dignity, sovereignty and legitimate rights of the DPRK and the campaign for "sanctions" and threat have reached a grave phase. 
					
					 All these moves for confrontation and war driving the situation on the peninsula to the brink of war are staged under the absurd pretext of "provocations from the north". 
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean authorities are hell bent on the anti-DPRK confrontation moves and plot-breeding operations, branding the DPRK's access to nukes, launch of satellites for peaceful purposes and counter-measures against their war moves as "provocations". 
					
					 This reminds one of a thief crying "Stop the thief!"
					
					 Who is the real provoker aggravating the tension on the peninsula and where is the root cause of straining the situation?
					
					 As a matter of course, it is the trite method of the imperialists to invade other country after branding it as provoker. 
					
					 Typical examples of it were the last Korean War and the Vietnamese War, both ignited by the U.S. 
					
					 Its trumpeting about "provocations from the north" is part of these war moves for aggression and a product of its persistent anti-DPRK campaign. 
					
					 The nuclear issue is the matter over which the U.S. and south Korea pull up the DPRK, citing it as a "provocation".
					
					 They are much upset by the fact that the DPRK declared itself as a nuclear weapons state and codified it in its Constitution. They are making much fuss, labeling the exercise of its legitimate right to nuclear development as "a provocation" in every case. 
					
					 This is a brazen-faced provocation as it amounts to falsifying facts. 
					
					 The DPRK has consistently advocated the denuclearization of the peninsula. Then why did it have access to nuclear weapons?
					
					 Where does a nuclear threat come from and who is threatening whom?
					
					 During the last Korean War the U.S. imperialists took a large number of people in the north to south Korea through A-bomb scare, causing a great national tragedy of "10 million separated family members".  The Korean people still clearly remember this. 
					
					 It was none other than the U.S. which introduced nukes into south Korea first and turned it into the biggest nuclear arsenal in the world. It is again the U.S. which has been hell bent on the nuclear war exercises for several decades. 
					
					 It openly cried out for "a preemptive nuclear attack" on the DPRK and disclosed its sinister scenario for nuclear attack, releasing "nuclear posture review" and talking about "extended nuclear deterrence". The U.S. worked out operation plans related to the scenario and frantically stepped up the moves for a nuclear war, staging war exercises under the simulated conditions of an actual war. 
					
					 After the demise of the era of the Cold War, nuclear powers decided to reduce nukes and refrain from leveling them at each other. But, the U.S. more desperately brandished its nuclear stick against the DPRK. 
					
					 For how long the DPRK has to remain exposed to the nuclear threat of the U.S.?
					
					 It was none other than the U.S. which compelled the DPRK to have access to nuclear weapons. 
					
					 Had the U.S. lent an ear to the earnest call of the DPRK for the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula even a bit, the nuclear issue at present would have not surfaced. 
					
					 It is preposterous for the U.S., the chieftain of nuclear threat and nuclear superpower, to vociferate about "nuclear threat from the north." 
					
					 The south Korean puppet regime has neither justification nor qualification to pull up the DPRK over its nuclear deterrence as it offered south Korea as an advanced nuclear base of the U.S. and has faithfully served the U.S.  as a servant and shock brigade in the U.S. master's nuclear war moves. It should be punished by the Korean nation. 
					
					 The satellite launch is another issue over which the U.S. and the south Korean authorities pull up the DPRK. 
					
					 They persistently termed the DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purposes long-range missile launch. They are raising a hue and cry over "provocations," citing the nuclear issue and the satellite launch as pretexts for derailing the DPRK-U.S. negotiations and six-party talks. 
					
					 This is another shameless provocation. 
					
					 Space development is a right recognized by international law and, accordingly, various countries are launching satellites. 
					
					 To insist that only the DPRK should not be allowed to launch satellites is brigandish sophism. 
					
					 Before launching satellites, the DPRK strictly observed the relevant international law and took such a measure as an exception as inviting foreign experts and reporters to visit the satellite launch station, etc.
					
					 When the DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purpose was objectively confirmed, making it hard for them to find any excuse to find fault with it, they claimed that even if what the DPRK is supposed to launch  is a satellite, it should not be allowed to do so because ballistic missile technology is applied to the launch. 
					
					 What a far-fetched assertion it is.
					
					 According to their logic, Japan's satellite launch was aimed at ballistic missile development and the satellite the south Korean puppet forces are so anxious to put into space with the help of the third country despite repeated failures is also aimed at missile development, and they all should be called into question.
					
					 Moreover, it is illogical for the U.S. to loudly talk about "missile threats" from the DPRK even though it launches dozens of satellites every year and frequently carries out up-to-date missile test-fire and interceptor missile tests.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet group are calling the countermeasures taken by the DPRK to cope with their provocations "provocations" and "threats".
					
					 This is sheer sophism and a grave provocation against the DPRK.
					
					 It is none other than the U.S. and south Korea which stage hundreds of anti-DPRK war drills including Key Resolve, Ulji Freedom Guardian and Foal Eagle, firing at the flag of the DPRK and fanning up war atmosphere crying out for "occupation of Pyongyang" and "strike at the window of office".
					
					 They also openly disclosed their attempt at confrontation between social systems and conducted frantic anti-DPRK psychological campaign as evidenced by scattering of leaflets and "anti-DPRK broadcasting" with the use of even human scum, while citing "emergency situation" and "unification under the liberal democratic system".
					
					 They provoke the DPRK first and when the DPRK takes countermeasures, they call them "provocations".
					
					 It is universally known that the warship sinking case orchestrated by the puppet forces of south Korea and Yonphyong Island shelling preempted by them in 2010 only backfired.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet group blame the deteriorated north-south ties and the tensions mounting on the Korean Peninsula on "Cheonan" sinking and Yonphyong shelling but this is just a trick to cover up their crime and shift the responsibility on to the DPRK.
					
					 The deteriorated ties and rising tensions date back to the time when Lee Myung Bak ditched north-south joint declarations and declared an all-out confrontation with the DPRK as his north policy after taking office.
					
					 Challenging the DPRK's sincere efforts for the improvement of the north-south ties, the Lee Myung Bak group brought to collapse all dialogues and cooperation between the two sides and slandered the social system of the DPRK and even the dignity of its supreme leadership by making all kinds of provocations, thus plunging the ties into an uncontrollable phase.
					
					 It is needless to say that had the north-south joint declaration been implemented it would have helped improve the inter-Korean relations, the West Sea of Korea turned into the sea of peace and such horrible incidents not happened. 
					
					 Hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK is the most heinous and thrice-cursed provocation.
					
					 They committed the incident of targeting the supreme leadership in drilling grounds of the puppet army and reserve troops, touching off bitter anger of the army and people of the DPRK and astonishing the world. The incident of insulting photos of peerlessly great persons and slogans about them, the evil doings done during the nation's mourning over the great loss to the nation and smear campaign of slandering the political events of the DPRK are all heinous crimes against humanity unimaginable by human being and the most hideous provocation unprecedented in history.
					
					 The puppet group, obsessed with escalating confrontation, took issue with the non-existent "human rights" issue and found fault with the economy and the living of the people in the DPRK. They even defamed the pure feelings and sincere tears the people and children shed mourning the death of their leader.
					
					 There cannot be more vicious provocation than this.
					
					 The U.S. has made desperate efforts to apply sanctions against the DPRK and isolate, seal off and stifle it by abusing the UN name while carrying a dagger under the coat. The Lee Myung Bak group is rebuffed by the public for its unpopular rule and deterioration of people's living. It is very despicable provocation to talk about "human rights" in the DPRK and "people's living".
					
					 The U.S. tops the world's list of military expenditure and the puppet group of south Korea pours money collected from people as taxes into war preparations. They have no qualification to talk about "expenditure".
					
					 The U.S. and the Lee group's moves for a war of aggression compelled the DPRK to direct its efforts to the building of national defense. But they are taking issue with its economy, people's living, "human rights" and even "expenditure". This betrays their black-hearted intentions and provocative nature. 
					
					 American-style capitalist society and corrupt society in south Korea, a colony of the U.S., can be heaven to 1 % of population but they are hell to 99%. But in Korean-style socialist society centered on the popular masses, people form a big harmonious family, helping and leading each other forward as masters of the country and enjoying free medical care and free education. Which society is more advantageous?
					
					 The answer of the DPRK people is clear.
					
					 As we have already increased defence capabilities in every way, we can lead a happy life under socialism with no more to desire in the world if we reach the high peak of an economic power in the wake of a political and military power.
					
					 That's why the people in the DPRK have now turned out in the general charge for final victory full of confidence to bring the day earlier.
					
					 Those obsessed with the law of the jungle, individualism and the idea that money is everything can never understand why the Korean people value their social system so much and protect it at the cost of their lives, regarding it their greatest happiness to live under it.
					
					 To slander the Korean people this or that way is a mockery and insult to their unblemished thoughts and feelings and an unpardonable provocation to them.
					
					 All facts clearly prove that it is the U.S. and the puppet group of south Korea that escalate confrontation and tension on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Clear are the aims sought by the U.S. and the puppet group in raising a hue and cry over "provocations from the north".
					
					 Their smear campaign is to tarnish the DPRK's prestige and ward off its influence, much upset by an invincible might of the DPRK shedding its rays all over the world and winning victory day after day as a just mouthpiece, guardian of peace and a socialist stronghold under the uplifted banner of Songun, led by the outstanding and tested leader, the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 It is also aimed to pass the buck for the bedeviled inter-Korean relations and escalated tension on the Korean Peninsula to the DPRK and justify their confrontation and war moves in a bid to realize their wild ambition to invade it.
					
					 Lurking behind their trumpeting about "provocations from the north" is a black-hearted intention to chill the daily growing desire to achieve reunification through alliance with the north, destabilize it, break its single-minded unity and bar Koreans from achieving reunification through their concerted efforts.
					
					 Looking back on history, the U.S. instigated the puppet group to orchestrate shocking incidents whenever the desire for reconciliation, unity and reunification mounted between the north and the south and desperately blocked them.
					
					 The U.S. ignited the Korean War on June 25, 1950 to bar the north and the south from moving toward national reunification and put the whole of Korea under its control. It hurled the Park Chung-Hee's military hooligan into staging the May 16 military coup. When the desire to achieve reunification through alliance with the north grew stronger under the slogan "Let us go to north, come south, let us meet at Panmunjom," the U.S. drove him into dashing it in a sinister bid to perpetuate the nation's division and keep south Korea as its permanent colony. This is not secret.
					
					 In the 1970s when the July 4 joint declaration was adopted, the U.S. chilled the south Koreans' desire by establishing the "yusin" dictatorial system and intensifying the moves for a war against the north. In the 1980s and the 1990s when multi-faceted dialogues took place and the road was paved for exchange and cooperation, it got frantic with nuclear war racket against the DPRK including the "Team Spirit" Joint Military Exercise, putting a check bar on them. 
					
					 The decisive turning point for reunification was brought about on the Korean Peninsula with the publication of the June 15 joint declaration as a momentum. Much upset by this, the U.S. set up the Lee Myung Bak conservative regime and let it rapidly push the inter-Korean relations to collapse.
					
					 The U.S. is just a root cause that drove the inter-Korean ties to a catastrophic phase and deteriorated the situation on the peninsula.
					
					 Now the U.S. arrogance, high-handedness and arbitrariness have reached the extreme pitch.
					
					 Conniving at all the illegal actions of those countries obedient to it, the U.S. seeks hard to stifle those independent countries branding their legitimate rights and just assertions as illegal and styling itself "international military policeman" and "world judge".
					
					 If it feels the need of the UN in carrying out its policy for aggression, it abuses the name of the UN, and if not, it disregards the UN and international law and invades other countries at will.
					
					 This is the tragic situation of the world.
					
					 There are so many countries and nations in the world that fell victim to the U.S.
					
					 When the joint declaration was published, the UN fully hailed it.
					
					 It, however, failed to make any statement denouncing the action of the U.S. and the south Korean puppets when they ditched the June 15 joint declaration but sided with their moves for confrontation and war.
					
					 This is, indeed, a deplorable situation.
					
					 Such an abnormal situation should no longer be allowed to remain intact.
					
					 The DPRK will as ever make strenuous efforts in a responsible manner for detente and peace on the peninsula as it did in the past. But if the U.S. and the south Korean puppet group take provocative actions, taking issue with the DPRK without any ground, the DPRK will show no mercy but decisively smash their actions.
					
					 The impartial world media and progressives and south Koreans from all walks of life should properly see who is a provocateur in the peninsula in order to flatly reject the "theory of the provocation by the north" much touted by the U.S. and the south Korean forces and raise the voices of support and solidarity for the just cause of the DPRK.
					
					 All Koreans in the north and the south of Korea will frustrate the criminal "theory of provocation by the north" spread by the U.S. and the south Korean puppets group, wipe out the enemies of reunification to the last man on the peninsula and bring about the June 15 era of reunification again without fail by concerted efforts of the Koreans.

articles.title: MDL Was Drawn by U.S. to Divide Korea: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
MDL Was Drawn by U.S. to Divide Korea: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- Originally, the 38th parallel Military Demarcation Line (MDL) dividing Korea into the north and the south was fabricated by the U.S. imperialists in pursuance of their own interests. It has neither validity nor justification to exist. 
					Rodong Sinmun Friday says this in a bylined article.
					
					It was the calculation of the U.S. imperialists that if they occupy the Korean Peninsula, they can advance into the continent with the peninsula as a springboard and, furthermore, dominate the world. They set it as their strategy to swallow up Korea replacing the Japanese imperialists at a time when the Second World War was close to its end, and rolled up their sleeves to carry it out, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					As it became clear that the U.S. imperialists could not occupy Korea single-handed in face of a rapid speed of attack of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army and the Soviet Army which declared a war against Japan, they hatched a plot to find a substantial solution to the issue of occupying south Korea. That was the "line for sharing duties" to accept the surrender of troops of the Imperial Japanese Army and disarm them.
					
					This proposal was put in a document as "General Order" No. 1 soon to be notified to the allied states on August 13, 1945. It was conveyed to MacArthur in Manila on August 15 before being proclaimed on September 2.
					
					The cunning U.S. imperialists used this document for carrying out their strategy for permanently occupying south Korea and turning it into a colony in a bid to dominate the world. They set this line as the cursed demarcation line which imposed the tragedy of division upon the Korean people. The U.S.-made 38th parallel MDL caused the tragic division of Korea, not a defeated nation.
					
					The U.S. imperialists put south Korea, not a territory of an enemy state, under military occupation and enforced military administration under the pretext of "disarming" troops of the Imperial Japanese Army. These were illegal and high-handed actions. 
					
					The history since the fabrication of the 38th parallel MDL goes to prove before the whole world that the U.S. imperialists are the sworn enemy of the Korean nation as they imposed only division and war on it.

articles.title: National Independence Is Fundamental Principle for Korea's Reunification
articles.content:
National Independence Is Fundamental Principle for Korea's Reunification
Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- The Kuwaiti and Brazilian papers carried commemorative articles to mark the 12th birthday of the June 15 joint declaration. 
					The Kuwaiti paper Al-Ray on June 19 said that Korea's reunification is, in essence, an issue of taking back half of its land from the domination of foreign forces and establishing the national sovereignty throughout Korea. The paper went on:
					
					National independence is an aim and, at the same time, the fundamental principle for resolving the issue of Korea's reunification.
					
					When the north and the south respect and implement the idea of "By our nation itself" clarified in the June 15 joint declaration in 2000 and October 4 declaration in 2007, Korea's national reunification is sure to be achieved.
					
					The international community should extend full support and solidarity to the Korean nation determined to reunify the country under the banner of national independence.
					
					The Brazilian paper Hora do Povo on June 20 introduced the efforts of the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK government to implement the north-south joint declaration.
					
					The paper exposed the crimes the south Korean regime committed by seeking confrontation against the DPRK and the national reunification, while scrapping all the agreements in the June 15 era and striking down the valuable achievements common to the nation.

articles.title: End to Unequal S. Korea-U.S. Relations Demanded
articles.content:
End to Unequal S. Korea-U.S. Relations Demanded
Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- A lawmaker from the Unified Progressive Party of south Korea issued a commentary on June 13 on the lapse of 10 years since GIs drove their armored car over south Korean schoolgirls Sim Mi Son and Sin Hyo Sun, killing them in cold blood.
					Candlelights held high by people in the memory of the two victims ten years ago were aimed to put an end to the U.S. belligerency and preserve the sovereignty and peace of the nation, the commentary said, and went on:
					
					The unequal "Status of Forces Agreement" (SOFA) is the root cause of GIs' ceaseless crimes.
					
					The Lee Myung Bak regime keeps maintaining humiliating relations with the U.S., not trying to amend even a single word in the SOFA.
					
					The commentary urged it to set right the unequal relations with the U.S.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak's Pro-Japanese Remarks under Fire
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak's Pro-Japanese Remarks under Fire
Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- The Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers Corps in south Korea in an open questionnaire on June 12 condemned traitor Lee Myung Bak for his pro-Japanese remarks over the issue of comfort women for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					The organization recalled that Lee talked such nonsense at a press conference with local and foreign reporters on the same day that Japan should "take humanitarian steps" for those who were forced to serve as comfort women for the Imperial Japanese Army, "if hard to take legal ones" for them.
					
					The issue of the comfort women must be legally settled under any circumstances as it was an inhumane war crime committed by the state power of Japan, it held.
					
					"We cannot but question Lee what was his real intention of talking about 'humanitarian settlement instead of a legal one'", the organization protested.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Calls for Abrogating SL
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Calls for Abrogating SL
Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Internet paper Jaju Minbo carried an article on June 13 contributed by Ri Chang Gi who is behind bars on charges of violation of the draconic "Security Law".
					The article said:
					
					People of different social standings in south Korea are becoming evermore vocal demanding the repeal of the SL.
					
					The present regime is rejected by the people and accused of being an anti-human rights "government" in the international arena because it invoked the SL at random.
					
					As a matter of fact, a death sentence has been given to the SL. As long as the conservative forces insist on preserving the SL, they cannot but be further isolated from the people.
					
					The conservative forces accuse the north and label the pro-reunification movement as "forces following the north", while talking about the SL. This is just like a dog barking at the moon.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Is to Blame for Division, Confrontation: Regional Organization
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Is to Blame for Division, Confrontation: Regional Organization
Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- The International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions posted on its Internet website an article titled "June 15 for Reunification and Its Enemy" on June 15, the 12th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					The article said the Lee Myung Bak regime of south Korea has denied the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration since the first day of its office.
					
					It exposed that the regime barred the cooperation between the north and the south from making smooth progress and created the confrontation phase by cooking up plots in succession.
					
					With exchange and cooperation between the two halves of Korea completely blocked, a very acute situation is prevailing on the Korean Peninsula, it said.
					
					The Korean people have already sentenced to death the Lee group of traitors, chieftain of division and confrontation, in the name of the whole nation.

articles.title: Anniversary of June 15 North-South Joint Declaration Marked in Germany
articles.content:
Anniversary of June 15 North-South Joint Declaration Marked in Germany
Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- The German branch of the Korean Friendship Association issued a bulletin on June 14 to mark the 12th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					The bulletin said:
					
					The north-south summit was held in Pyongyang in June of 2000 amid great concern and expectation of the world. The two sides adopted the historic joint declaration, ushering in the June 15 era of reunification.
					
					Exchanges and cooperation were brisk in different fields and the enthusiasm to achieve reunification mounted after the publication of the joint declaration.
					
					The movement for national reunification gained in scope on a nationwide scale.
					
					The north-south summit which took place in October of 2007 in the course of implementing the June 15 joint declaration resulted in the adoption of the "Declaration for Development of North-South Relations and Peace and Prosperity." 
					
					Recalling that the efforts made by the DPRK for national reunification faced great hurdles due to the anti-reunification and treacherous acts of the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors in south Korea to escalate the confrontation with fellow countrymen, the bulletin went on:
					
					The June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration reflected the desire of the Korean people and the requirements of the times.
					
					We express full support for the Korean people in their struggle for implementing the declarations.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Reported by Laotian Media
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Reported by Laotian Media
Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- Laotian media on June 21 reported a detailed gist of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Comrade Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and People".
					The work, published on April 20, 2012, deals with the revolutionary exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					It indicates the tasks for firmly upholding and preserving their idea and exploits and glorifying them forever.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Noble Idea Supported by Peruvian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Noble Idea Supported by Peruvian Organization
 Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Suk Library in Peru issued a statement on June 19 on publication of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's work.
					 The statement said:
					
					 Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Korean people, made public the thesis "The Great Comrade Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and People" on April 20.
					
					 He released the celebrated work "Let Us Hold Great Comrade Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as General Secretary of Our Party Forever and Successfully Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche" on April 6, showing his strong sense of moral obligation towards the preceding leaders of the revolution. This time he created the model of the cause of perpetuating the memory of the leader by publishing the historic thesis.
					
					 Kim Jong Suk Library in Peru positively supports and sympathizes with the noble idea of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The progressive people and revolutionaries in Peru express conviction that the Korean people will surely win a victory in the struggle for the completion of the cause of Juche and national reunification under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats in Party Building Hailed by Cambodian, Ugandan Media
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats in Party Building Hailed by Cambodian, Ugandan Media
Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- Cambodian and Ugandan media from June 11 to 19 observed the 48th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					A Cambodian radio said that Kim Jong Il performed immortal exploits while leading the WPK for several decades after starting his work there.
					
					He made sure that the WPK preserved its revolutionary principle consistently and most thoroughly, the radio said, adding:
					
					The WPK has steadily developed into an invincible party that has taken its roots deep among the masses, and a mother party that has formed an integral whole with the people. His exploits in party building will shine forever.
					
					Apsara Television and Sound Broadcasting of this country aired similar contents.
					
					UBC Broadcasting of Uganda said that Kim Jong Il steadily developed the WPK into an invincible revolutionary party and made an undying contribution to global independence true to the cause of President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Remembrance Committee for Kim Il Sung Organized in Benin
articles.content:
Remembrance Committee for Kim Il Sung Organized in Benin
Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- The Committee of the Socialist Party of Benin for Remembering President Kim Il Sung was organized in Cotonou on June 22.
					Ali Houdou, president of the Socialist Party of Benin, was elected chairman of the committee at the inaugural meeting.
					
					The committee decided to organize colorful political and cultural events for praising the greatness and exploits of Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: U.S. Anti-DPRK Moves Accused by Peruvian Organization
articles.content:
U.S. Anti-DPRK Moves Accused by Peruvian Organization
Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship issued a statement on June 22 to denounce the U.S. undisguised arms buildup against the DPRK.
					The statement said:
					
					These days the U.S. imperialists have gone reckless in their maneuvers to provoke a new war in collusion with the reactionaries in Japan and the puppet forces in south Korea, their lackeys. They are stepping up arms buildup against the DPRK instead of drawing a lesson from their bitter defeat in the last Korean War.
					
					They must not forget that their long-running ambitions for aggression and moves for provoking a new war compelled the DPRK to access nuclear weapons.
					
					The fraternal Korean people love peace but will never pardon the aggressors who are set to threaten and disturb it.
					
					The Peruvian progressives condemn the U.S. imperialists' escalated moves for arms buildup against the DPRK and extend solidarity to the Korean people in their efforts to defend the peace and curb the aggressors.

articles.title: Events Abroad Mark Anniversaries in DPRK
articles.content:
Events Abroad Mark Anniversaries in DPRK
Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries to mark the 48th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the 12th anniversary of the June 15 North and South Joint Declaration.
					They included a remembrance meeting in Peru, a seminar in the Czech Republic, a rally, book and photo exhibition and a film show in Switzerland and lectures in Indonesia from June 7 to 14.
					
					Displayed in the venues were books and photos introducing the immortal exploits performed by Kim Jong Il.
					
					The president of the General Kim Jong Il Peruvian Amicable Institute who is president of the Peruvian National Independent Movement for Free Voting's Union said that Kim Jong Il led the Korean revolution along the road of the victory till the last moments of his life and steadily developed the WPK into an ever-victorious party and the DPRK into an invincible socialist power.
					
					The chairman of the Czech Group for the Study and Materialization of the Juche Idea said that Kim Jong Il's start of work at the WPK Central Committee marked a turn in strengthening the WPK into President Kim Il Sung's party.
					
					The secretary general of the Switzerland-Korea Committee lauded Kim Jong Il's exploits in the cause of national reunification, adding that he provided a north-south summit meeting in June 2000 and opened up a bright prospect for the national reunification.
					
					Messages to the dear respected Kim Jong Un were adopted at the events in Peru and Czech.
					
					Meanwhile, a Korean book and art exhibition was opened in Russia on June 16 to mark the anniversary of Kim Jong Il's start of work at the C.C., the WPK.

articles.title: Russian FM Spokesman Accuses U.S. of Its "Human Trafficking Report"
articles.content:
Russian FM Spokesman Accuses U.S. of Its "Human Trafficking Report"
Moscow, June 28 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Russian Foreign Ministry on June 25 chided the "human trafficking report" released by the U.S. Department of State.
					The spokesman said that the report listed the U.S. and other Western countries as "excellent countries" in combating "flesh traffic" while classifying those countries which incur the displeasure of the U.S. as those in which human rights of people are wantonly violated and called for slapping sanctions on them.
					
					The U.S. State Department which makes a detail survey of "flesh traffic" situation in other countries has failed to look into its own problem, the spokesman said, adding that the fact goes to prove that the U.S. still remains the world's biggest "flesh trafficker."
					
					100 000-500 000 immigrants are falling victim to flesh traffic for labor exploitation and 100 000 children are forced into prostitution in the U.S. every year, he noted.
					
					The U.S. report is keeping mum about the fact that there are facilities for sexual slaves in U.S. military bases overseas, he noted, expressing skepticism about the substantial effect of the "U.S.-style remedy for combating flesh traffic" which the State Department has billed as a model.

articles.title: Pakistanis Killed by U.S. Drone Strikes
articles.content:
Pakistanis Killed by U.S. Drone Strikes
Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- At least four people were killed and two others injured when U.S. drones fired two missiles at a house suspected of being a militants' hideout in Pakistan's northwest tribal area of North Waziristan on Tuesday night, reported local TV channel Dunya.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia manuscritos a funcionarios, trabajadores y ninos
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia manuscritos a funcionarios, trabajadores y ninos
Pyongyang, 29 de junio (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un leyo las cartas y documentos que le remitieron los funcionarios y trabajadores de varias entidades y ninos y dejo manuscritos en ellos.
					Los remitentes son Hwang Sun Hui, directora del Museo de la Revolucion Coreana, los funcionarios del Ministerio de Transporte Terrestre y Maritimo y los miembros de la brigada de construccion del puerto de Tanchon de la provincia de Hamgyong del Sur, los granjeros de la Granja Cooperativa de Wonhwa del distrito de Phyongwon de la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur, el equipo de produccion de caramelo de la Fabrica de Alimentos de Musan de la provincia de Hamgyong del Norte, el primer colectivo de creacion de los Estudios de Filmes para Ninos 26 de Abril de Corea, los miembros de la celula del partido de la Fabrica de Cemento del distrito de Hwaphyong de la provincia de Jagang, las gremiales de la Union de Mujeres Democraticas de Corea en el Complejo Carbonifero Juventud de la Region de Sunchon de la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur, las integrantes del peloton de familiares de los funcionarios del comite distrital del partido que trabajan en la brigada de mantenimiento de a utopistas del distrito de Sangwon, los funcionarios, empleados, cientificos y tecnicos de la empresa de construccion de lineas de transmision electrica, la Fabrica de Confeccion de Ropas Ponghwa de Raknang, la Fabrica de Articulos de Uso Diario de Pyongyang, las instituciones deportivas y empresas adscritas al Ministerio de Deportes, la Casa-cuna Kim Jong Suk y la Academia de Medicina Coryo, y los asistentes, empleados y ninos del Jardin de la Infancia de Kyongsang.
					
					Ellos escribieron en sus cartas que el amor de los grandes hombres, quienes abrazan a todos los soldados revolucionarios y los estimulan depositandoles confianza, devino la fuerza motriz de creacion del nuevo milagro y proezas en la gran marcha para la construccion del Estado prospero.
					
					En cada frase de las cartas se denota la voluntad de los uniformados y civiles coreanos de lograr la nueva victoria de la revolucion del Juche bajo la orientacion del Maximo Dirigente enalteciendo al Dirigente Kim Jong Il como eterno lider del PTC.
					
					Informado de que Han Hyon Gyong, alumna del cuarto grado de la Escuela Secundaria de Inphung del distrito de Sinhung de la provincia de Hamgyong del Sur, quien defendio a costa de la vida los retratos de los Tres Generales del monte Paektu en el momento peligroso en que su casa se derrumbaba por la avalancha causada por lluvias torrenciales, el Maximo Dirigente envio su autografo destacando que el espiritu puro de la nina sera eterno y formara a otros jovenes excelentes del pais.

articles.title: Organos docentes y de crianza de ninos construidos en avenida Changjon
articles.content:
Organos docentes y de crianza de ninos construidos en avenida Changjon
Pyongyang, 29 de junio (ACNC) -- Los organos docentes y de crianza de ninos recien inaugurados en la capitalina avenida Changjon estan ocupados por acoger a los alumnos y ninos.
					Gracias a la minuciosa direccion del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un quien desea glorificar la historia de noble amor por las generaciones venideras del Presidente Kim Il Sung y del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, fueron construidos magnificamente los organos docente y de crianza de ninos.
					
					Entre ellos se distinguen la Escuela Primaria de Changjon de Pyongyang, el Jardin Infantil y Casa Cuna, de Kyongsang.
					
					En el patio de la Escuela Primaria de Changjon de Pyongyang esta erguida la estatua de bronce del Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					
					En la pared del edificio esta pegada la consigna "!Aprendamos para Corea!".
					
					La escuela comprende decenas de salas inclusive las aulas, la sala de estudio con ordenador y la de medios de ensenanza.
					
					En las clases estan las televisiones para la educacion, los pupitres, las sillas y particularmente los cajones de carteras.
					
					Segun la maestra Ri Hyo Song (23 anos de edad),  esos cajones de carteras brindan mas comodidades que antes a los alumnos que ponian sus carteras detras o a lado de de sus sillas.
					
					En el pasillo estan los bancos con percheros para que en invierno o en la estacion de mucha lluvia los alumnos colgaran sus abrigos o impermeables.
					
					Esto fue la iniciativa del Maximo Dirigente     Kim Jong Un quien la visito en mayo pasado.
					
					Los edificios del Jardin Infantil y Casa Cuna, de Kyongsang, son magnificos en lo plastico y artistico.
					
					En el patio del jardin infantil estan instalados varios equipos de recreo como el tobogan, enviados por el Maximo Dirigente.
					
					En el pasillo las distintas flores decorativas y los titeres dan una sensacion de sumergirse en el mundo infantil.
					
					Fueron acondicionadas la piscina y otras salas de juego conforme a la psicologia infantil.
					
					El patio de la casa cuna, donde estan instalados los equipos recreativos, fue cubierto por la cesped artificial para que los ninos no tengan heridas.
					
					En estos edificios estan asegurados todas condiciones y el ambiente para el estudio y vida feliz de los escolares y ninos.

articles.title: EE.UU. no puede ocultar su identidad de provocador de guerra (3)
articles.content:
EE.UU. no puede ocultar su identidad de provocador de guerra (3)
Pyongyang, 29 de junio (ACNC) -- 
					
					?Por que fijo el 25 de junio?
						
					
					Estados Unidos provoco el 25 de junio la guerra coreana para ocultar su verdadera naturaleza de provocador de guerra.
					
					En la historia la "tactica de ataque sorpresivo en la madrugada de domingo" fue el metodo predilecto de los imperialistas. Se iniciaron en la madrugada de domingo la guerra Rusia-Japon, la China-Japon y la del Pacifico.
					
					EE.UU. anadio en este metodo el nuevo sentido, lo cual se revelo a traves de las palabras de Robert, jefe del grupo de asesores militares de EE.UU. 
					
					Aclarando por que EE.UU. fijo el 25 de junio, Robert dijo a Syngman Rhee que el dia 25 era el domingo y EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea, paises cristianos, fijaron el domingo como dia de descanso, razon por la cual nadie creyera que la guerra se haya provocado en el domingo por EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea, es decir, para que la gente creyera que EE.UU. o el Sur de Corea no hayan iniciado la guerra.
					
					Al movilizar los medios de prensa venales para ocultar tal naturaleza de provocador de guerra, EE.UU. difundio la desinformacion de que fue levantada el dia 24 la "ley marcial de emergencia no regular" proclamada el 13 de junio y ese dia salieron de los cuarteles dos tercios de los efectivos del ejercito titere y todos los jefes de divisiones del frente de paralelo 38 participaron en el "baile" efectuado por la noche del dia 24 en el club de las fuerzas terrestres titeres de Seul.
					
					Pero, segun testimonios de Ri Song Ga, ex jefe de division no.8 del ejercito titere en la parte oriental del frente, en visperas del 25 de junio se prohibio al ejercito surcoreano del paralelo 38 la salida y mantuvo el estado de alerta combativa, para desatar a la madrugada del 25 el ataque.
					
					Asi, estallo la guerra coreana.
					
					EE.UU. no puede ocultar con nada la faz verdadera de provocador de guerra ni eludir la severa sentencia de la historia.
					
					En vez de sacar las lecciones merecidas en la amarga derrota sufrida en la pasada guerra coreana, el imperio intenta provocar la segunda guerra coreana, la nuclear junto con los titeres surcoreanos y reaccionarios japoneses.
					
					Quienes no desean la paz sino la guerra, deben tener clara cuenta de que si desencadenan otra vez la guerra de agresion sin olvidar las lecciones de la historia, recibiran el rotundo contraataque del ejercito y el pueblo de la RPDC y no evitaran el destino ignominioso.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun explica el curso de aparicion del paralelo 38
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun explica el curso de aparicion del paralelo 38
Pyongyang, 29 de junio (ACNC) -- El paralelo 38, que divide a Corea en el Norte y el Sur, no tiene razon ni justificacion de existir porque fue inventado por Estados Unidos para sus intereses.
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual publicado este viernes y continua:
					
					EE.UU. pensaba que si ocupa la Peninsula Coreana, podra avanzar al continente asiatico usandola como trampolin y, a la larga, dominar a todo el mundo. Establecio a finales de la Segunda Guerra Mundial la estrategia de conquista de toda Corea en lugar del imperialismo japones e hizo esfuerzos persistentes por ponerla en practica.
					
					En aquel entonces, el intrepido ataque del Ejercito Revolucionario Popular de Corea y el ejercito de la ex URSS, que declararon la guerra con Japon, hizo a EE.UU. desistir de su intento de ocupar a solas a Corea.
					
					De ahi que comenzo a buscar una solucion real para ocupar el suelo surcoreano e ideo finalmente la "linea de limitacion de responsabilidades" para recibir la capitulacion del ejercito japones y desarmarlo.
					
					La iniciativa se concreto en la "orden normal" no.1 que fue avisada el 13 de agosto de 1945 a los paises aliados y dos dias despues, a MacArthur que se encontraba entonces en Manila y fue publicada el 2 del mes siguiente.
					
					El imperio utilizo esa linea para ocupar perpetuamente y colonizar el Sur de Corea en funcion de su estrategia de dominar a todo el mundo, de manera que ella se fijara como la maldita linea de demarcacion que impuso al pueblo coreano la tragedia de division. 
					
					Debido al paralelo 38 fabricado por el imperialismo norteamericano, Corea sufrio la division nacional aunque no fue pais derrotado en la Segunda Guerra Mundial.
					
					Bajo el pretexto de "desarme" del ejercito japones, EE.UU. ocupo militarmente el suelo surcoreano, que no es tierra del pais enemigo, y practico ilegalmente la dominacion militar.
					
					La historia que data de aquel dia de fabricacion del paralelo delata a todo el mundo que el imperialismo yanqui es enemigo jurado de la nacion coreana que impuso a ella solo la division y la guerra.
